code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getWisata}from'../api';import{Container,Row,Col,Card,Carousel}from'react-bootstrap';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=_ref=>{let{language,darkMode}=_ref;const[wisataList,setWisataList]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{getWisata().then(data=>setWisataList(data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{fluid:true,className:`mt-5 pt-5 ${darkMode?"dark-mode":""}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Carousel,{className:"carousel-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"d-block w-100 carousel-img",src:"/images/slide1.jpg",alt:"Slide 1"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"d-block w-100 carousel-img",src:"/images/slide2.jpg",alt:"Slide 2"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"d-block w-100 carousel-img",src:"/images/slide3.jpg",alt:"Slide 3"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:language==="id"?"Destinasi Wisata":"Tourist Destinations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:wisataList.length>0?wisataList.map(wisata=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:3,xs:6,className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:`shadow-sm ${darkMode?"dark-card":""}`,onClick:()=>navigate(`/detail/${wisata.id}`),style:{cursor:'pointer'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:`/images/${wisata.gambar}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{className:"text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:wisata.nama})})]})},wisata.id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center",children:language==="id"?"Tidak ada destinasi wisata tersedia.":"No tourist destinations available."})})]})]});};export default Home;
